original_title: Real for Us: Fandom, Friendship, and the Boy Who Lived
overview: Centered around a Harry Potter convention in 2011, this thought-provoking documentary asks, just what is so magical about Harry Potter? Die-hard fans talk about how growing up reading the Harry Potter series shaped their lives, and about the rich fandom community that gathered around the Boy Who Lived.
title: Real for Us: Fandom, Friendship, and the Boy Who Lived
